entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert fires in `EnsureMetadataVirtual` #73563
  • Consider adjusting wording for `ErrorCode.ERR_NoConvToIDisp` #73559
  • Follow up on used assemblies validation failure for `AnonymousTypeMember_02` unit-test #73558
  • Consider testing scenario similar to the one in `UnscopedRef_02` without params #73557
  • A misleading warning is reported for an inline array type with ref like type parameter as an element type #73556
  • Consider testing scenario similar to one in `MissingScopedInOverride_01`, but with implicitly scoped parameter #73555
  • Consider testing ERR_ScopedMismatchInParameterOfPartial and ERR_ScopedMismatchInParameterOfTarget when ref like type parameters are involved #73554
  • Enable `RefFieldTypeAllowsRefLike` test once we get support for 'byreflike' in IL #73553
  • New syntax related APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73552
  • A test gap in `VisitDeclarationPattern` method #73551
  • A test gap in `CheckInvocationArgMixing` method #73550
  • A test gap in `GetValEscape` method #73549
  • Remove `MetadataHelpers.GenericParameterAttributesAllowByRefLike` in favor of `GenericParameterAttributes.AllowByRefLike` #73548
  • Expose Hot Reload functionality for third-party tools #73543
  • Auto formatting C# code with list assignments does not indent correctly #73541
  • Interface implementation option not available for classes #73540

Closed

  • Code that compiled using SDK 8.0.250 fails to compile when using SDK 8.0.300 with error CS0121 #73506

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge branch 'features/RefStructInterfaces' into 'main' #73567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report EnC warning when entry point is changed #73565
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Work around crash in Document Outline #73564
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Improve intense CPU hotspot in FAR (part 2)" #73560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose Hot Reload feature for third party applications #73544
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Expose Solution and Project APIs for third-party tools #73542
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73538
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Disable nullable comparison optimization for decimals #73536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Batch FAR window update messages to lower refresh overhead. #73534
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: misc compiler layer work #73527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties

Merged

  • Check language version for more scenarios #73546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Deal with some PROTOTYPE comments #73561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Pack values for enum members #73562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • More classification perf fixes. #73535
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add a pinned pkcs entry #73515
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary allocations while finding token matches in a file #73547
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix up a couple places that create a buffer or sourcetext from strings #73537
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Install SDK in devcontainer based on global.json #73526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Lower the amount of time FAR spends in classification by 4% #73533
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix assert in ref safety analysis around BoundConditionalReceiver node. #73491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Target net9.0 in tests and provide real implementation for RuntimeSupportsByRefLikeGenerics helper #73525
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Move AsyncBatchingWorkQueue usage in telemetry to TelemetryLogging level #73485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update "ref in async" feature status #73489
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix CPM in official builds (2) #73532
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Convert from Newtonsoft to STJ in cohosting #73528
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Verify that ref-in-async errors are not downgraded to warnings in unsafe context #73490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, Next
  • Update razor serialization #73531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73522
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Improve performance of FAR #73523
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow razor to override RazorDesignTimeTargets to ones shipped with tooling instead of the sdk #73524
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2454194 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Avoid unnecessary allocations while finding token matches in a file #73500
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove dependency on all Roslyn assemblies from build host #73497
    Area-IDE, untriaged
